mapper.select: SELECT 'EQT'|| EMPL_QST_SEQ.NEXTVAL as qaNotiwrNo FROM DUAL
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPL_QST(QA_NOTIWR_NO, TTL, ID, CNTN, HTML_CNTN) VALUES (#{qaNotiwrNo}, #{ttl}, #{id}, #{cntn}, #{htmlCntn})
mapper.select: SELECT QA_NOTIWR_NO, TTL, ID, CNTN, HTML_CNTN, INQ_CNT, RPLY_CNT, REG_DT FROM EMPL_QST ORDER BY QA_NOTIWR_NO DESC
SELECT QA_NOTIWR_NO, TTL, ID, CNTN, HTML_CNTN, INQ_CNT, RPLY_CNT, REG_DT FROM EMPL_QST WHERE QA_NOTIWR_NO = #{qaNotiwrNo}
